publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2838 Stuart McMillan: 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper—That the Parliament congratulates Inverclyde Talking Newspaper on its 30 year anniversary in April 2009; notes that the talking newspaper has helped hundreds of people in Inverclyde with reading difficulties due to visual impairments; also notes the dedication of the Inverclyde Talking Newspaper team, which includes volunteers, to their many customers, and further notes that the Association of Scottish Talking Newspapers provides development of new talking newspapers, offering training and guidance. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson*, John Lamont*, Christina McKelvie*, Patrick Harvie*, Rob Gibson*, Ross Finnie*

S3M-2838 Stuart McMillan: 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper—That the Parliament congratulates Inverclyde Talking Newspaper on its 30-year anniversary in April 2009; notes that the talking newspaper has helped hundreds of people in Inverclyde with reading difficulties due to visual impairments; also notes the dedication of the Inverclyde Talking Newspaper team, which includes volunteers, to their many customers, and further notes that the Association of Scottish Talking Newspapers provides development of new talking newspapers, offering training and guidance. Supported by: Kenneth Gibson, John Lamont, Christina McKelvie, Patrick Harvie, Rob Gibson, Ross Finnie, Bill Kidd*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-2838 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper (lodged on 6 November 2008) Alasdair Allan*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*
S3M-2838 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper (lodged on 6 November 2008) Robin Harper*, Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2838 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper (lodged on 6 November 2008) Gil Paterson*
S3M-2838 30 Years of Inverclyde Talking Newspaper (lodged on 6 November 2008) Keith Brown*
